author: Sophie Lewis
title: Starbucks will pay all workers for 30 days — even if they stay home
description: As unemployment claims surge, Starbucks said it will pay all employees in the U.S. and Canada, even if they choose to stay home.
content: As the coronavirus pandemic intensifies across the U.S., many restaurants and cafes have switched to drive-thru, delivery and take-out only systems — but still, some workers feel uncomfortable putting their health at risk to come to work. This week, Starbucks… [+2112 chars]
